=== About ===

<nowiki>[[http://www.gkovacs.com/|Geza Kovacs]]</nowiki> is a computer science PhD student at Stanford.

=== Contributions ===

Created the <nowiki>[[http://wubi.sourceforge.net/|Windows-based Ubuntu Installer]]</nowiki> in the Winter of 2006, and wrote its <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=305109|Concept]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[install.exe|Specification]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[install.exe-Prototype|Prototype]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/setup-ubuntu|archived original code]]</nowiki>). The Windows-based Ubuntu Installer was later renamed to <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/wubi|Wubi]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/lupin|Lupin]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://wubi.sourceforge.net|Website]]</nowiki>), and is now part of Ubuntu.

Created the Universal Netboot Installer, <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/unetbootin|UNetbootin]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net|Website]]</nowiki>).
